languages.text: "Пусть кабал Ядовитого шепота слабосилен и малочисленен, но вы умеете причинять боль. Дозволяю тебе нанести первый порез".

traits.locale_text: "Хотя бы в этом я могу с тобой согласиться. Братья и сестры, наконец-то мы развлечемся по-настощему!"
traits.speaker: DrukhariLeaderM

languages.text: "The Kabal of the Poisonous Whisper may be feeble and few in number but inflicting pain is a talent you possess. I will allow you to make the first cut."
languages.original_text: "Пусть кабал Ядовитого шепота слабосилен и малочисленен, но вы умеете причинять боль. Дозволяю тебе нанести первый порез".

traits.locale_text: "The Kabal of the Poisonous Whisper may be feeble and few in number, but inflicting pain is a talent you possess. I am allowing you to make the first cut."
traits.speaker: DrukhariLeaderM

languages.text: « La Kabale du Murmure empoisonné est peut-être faible et clairsemée, mais il faut reconnaître que vous maîtrisez l'art de la torture. Je vous invite à infliger la première blessure. »
languages.original_text: "The Kabal of the Poisonous Whisper may be feeble and few in number but inflicting pain is a talent you possess. I will allow you to make the first cut."

traits.locale_text: « La Kabale du Murmure empoisonné est peut-être faible et clairsemée, mais il faut reconnaître que vous maîtrisez l'art de la torture. Je vous invite à infliger la première blessure. »
traits.speaker: DrukhariLeaderM

languages.text: “毒语阴谋团或许不太强大，人数也不多，但他们在痛苦方面的天赋无与伦比。我愿意允许你先动手。”
languages.original_text: "The Kabal of the Poisonous Whisper may be feeble and few in number but inflicting pain is a talent you possess. I will allow you to make the first cut."

traits.locale_text: “毒语阴谋团或许不太强大，人数也不多，但他们在痛苦方面的天赋无与伦比。我允许你先动手。”
traits.speaker: DrukhariLeaderM

languages.text: 「陰謀団『毒の囁き』は貧弱で数も少ないかもしれんが、苦痛を与えることにかけては才能がある。最初の一撃はお前に譲ってやろう」
languages.original_text: "The Kabal of the Poisonous Whisper may be feeble and few in number but inflicting pain is a talent you possess. I will allow you to make the first cut."

traits.locale_text: 「陰謀団『毒の囁き』は貧弱で数も少ないかもしれんが、苦痛を与えることにかけては才能がある。最初の一撃はお前に譲ってやろう」
traits.speaker: DrukhariLeaderM

languages.text: "Die Kabale des giftigen Geflüsters mag schwach sein und nur wenige Mitglieder haben, aber Ihr habt definitiv ein Talent dafür, Schmerz zuzufügen. Ich überlasse Euch den ersten Schnitt."
languages.original_text: "The Kabal of the Poisonous Whisper may be feeble and few in number but inflicting pain is a talent you possess. I will allow you to make the first cut."

traits.locale_text: "Die Kabale des giftigen Geflüsters mag schwach sein und nur wenige Mitglieder haben, aber Ihr habt definitiv ein Talent dafür, Schmerz zuzufügen. Ich überlasse Euch also den ersten Schnitt."
traits.speaker: DrukhariLeaderM

languages.text: «Puede que la Kábala del Susurro Venenoso sea débil y poco numerosa, pero infligir dolor es sin duda uno de vuestros talentos. Dejaré que hagas el primer corte».
languages.original_text: "The Kabal of the Poisonous Whisper may be feeble and few in number but inflicting pain is a talent you possess. I will allow you to make the first cut."

traits.locale_text: «Puede que la kábala del Susurro Venenoso sea débil y poco numerosa, pero infligir dolor es sin duda uno de vuestros talentos. Dejaré que hagas el primer corte».
traits.speaker: DrukhariLeaderM

languages.text: "Zehirli Fısıltı Kabalı olarak güçsüz ve sayıca az olsanız da acı çektirmek konusunda hünerlisiniz. Buyurun, ilk darbe sizden olsun."
languages.original_text: "The Kabal of the Poisonous Whisper may be feeble and few in number but inflicting pain is a talent you possess. I will allow you to make the first cut."

traits.locale_text: "Zehirli Fısıltı Kabalı olarak güçsüz ve sayıca az olsanız da acı çektirmek konusunda hünerlisiniz. Buyrun, ilk darbe sizden olsun."
traits.speaker: DrukhariLeaderM
